title: Bug 19089: Missing popup menu in Java Editor Ruler (Photon)
description: When using the Photon version of Eclipse, there is an issue where the popup menu in the Java Editor ruler does not appear.
OB: When using the Photon version of Eclipse and opening a Java Editor, the popup menu does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler.
EB: 1) Open a Java Editor in Eclipse Photon. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The popup menu to add breakpoints/marks, etc., should appear, but it does not.
SR: 1) Open Eclipse Photon. 2) Open a Java Editor. 3) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The popup menu to add breakpoints/marks, etc., should appear, but it does not.
